message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll love! I'm offering it to you for $15000. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand that $8000 is a significant price difference. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $12000 is my absolute minimum. Would you be open to considering a price closer to the middle ground, say $11000?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11000, but I'm still a bit shy of that. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm offering $9500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to come up to $9500. I'm happy to meet you halfway, but $10250 is the absolute lowest I can go at this point.  Let's try to close this deal, what do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Can you meet me at $9500?
